content: refresh your decor with this crochet blanket that s a modern showpiece of texture and design stitched in bernat maker splash the undulating stitches in this crochet chevron blanket provide the perfect canvas for the painterly colors in the yarn worked in an easy-to-memorize 2-row repeat that includes double_crochet double_crochet 3 together decreases and chain-one-skip-one eyelets you ll create a beautiful zigzag pattern that adds organic movement to any space materials bernat® maker splash™ 8 8 oz/250 g 305 yds/279 m teal print 35010 7 balls
